external_references.description: Hamzeloofard, S. (2020, January 31). New wave of PlugX targets Hong Kong | Avira Blog. Retrieved April 13, 2021.
Nick Dai, Vickie Su, Sunny Lu. (2022, November 18). Earth Preta Spear-Phishing Governments Worldwide. Retrieved August 4, 2025.

objects.description: [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has used tasklist /v to determine active process information.(Citation: Avira Mustang Panda January 2020) [Mustang Panda](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0129) has also used [TONESHELL](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1239) malware to check the process name and process path to ensure it matches the expected one prior to triggering a custom exception handler.(Citation: 2022 November_TrendMicro_Earth Preta_Toneshell_Pubload)
